review: I am totally disappointed in Amazon customer service when it comes to this device.  My stick keeps giving me "can't connect" when entering my Wi-Fi password, and yes, I know, it's case sensitive and yes, I know I input it correctly.  I spent an enormous amount of time with a tech who concluded the stick was defective and sent another.  Same problem with that stick.  This time, customer service bounces me back and forth between countries, with each level of assistance more clueless than the one before it.  I can see from the questions posted that I am not the only one with this problem.  I guess I will just return these pieces of garbage and get a second Roku box- never had any problems with Roku and it is  actually much cheaper if you factor in the hours of time I have wasted troubleshooting the firestick.
